law.catch_line: Authority's involvement in requested transfer of drinking water between water utilities involving Kentucky River basin watershed.
law.text: At the time a water utility requests a state agency to take action required to allow the transfer between water utilities of drinking water within or into the watershed of the Kentucky River basin, the water utility shall notify the authority of the request that has been made for state agency action. The authority shall review the request and comment on the requested transfer to the state agency within the time period for the review by the state agency.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 265, sec. 9, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 287, sec. 9, effective July 14, 2000.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/14/2000). This section was created by 2000 Ky. Acts chs. 265 and 287, which are identical and have been codified together.
